skills.name: Install Prisma
skills.pattern:
npm install prisma --save-dev
npm install @prisma/client

skills.name: Initialize Prisma
skills.pattern: npx prisma init

skills.name: Schema File
Model Definition
skills.pattern:
model User {
  id        Int      @id @default(autoincrement())
  email     String   @unique
  name      String?
  posts     Post[]
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
}

skills.name: Field Types
skills.pattern: String, Int, BigInt, Float, Decimal, Boolean, DateTime, Json, Bytes

skills.name: Attributes
skills.pattern: @id, @unique, @default(), @relation, @map, @updatedAt, @db.VarChar(255)

skills.name: Relations
Many-to-Many
Create Migration
skills.pattern: npx prisma migrate dev --name init

skills.name: Deploy Migration
skills.pattern: npx prisma migrate deploy

skills.name: Generate Client
skills.pattern: npx prisma generate

skills.name: Create Client
skills.pattern:
import { PrismaClient } from '@prisma/client';
const prisma = new PrismaClient();

skills.name: Create
Create Many
Find Unique
skills.pattern: const user = await prisma.user.findUnique({ where: { email: 'john@example.com' } });

skills.name: Find Many
Update
Upsert
Delete
skills.pattern:
await prisma.user.delete({ where: { id: 1 } });
await prisma.user.deleteMany({ where: { active: false } });

skills.name: Filters
Operators
skills.pattern: equals, not, in, notIn, lt, lte, gt, gte, contains, startsWith, endsWith, mode: 'insensitive'

skills.name: Include Relations
Select Fields
Aggregations
Group By
Transaction
Interactive Transaction
Raw SQL
skills.pattern:
const users = await prisma.$queryRaw`SELECT * FROM User WHERE age > ${18}`;
await prisma.$executeRaw`UPDATE User SET active = true WHERE id = ${id}`;

skills.name: Middleware
Prisma Studio
skills.pattern: npx prisma studio
